alert.note: Alert for Clay; Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 4:57PM CDT until July 22 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Clay County in south central Nebraska... Eastern Nuckolls County in south central Nebraska... West central Thayer County in south central Nebraska... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 457 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Edgar, or 26 miles southeast of Hastings, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Nelson around 510 PM CDT. Oak around 515 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Nora, Ruskin and Superior. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
